At the beginning of your end step, if you have at least 15 life more than your starting life total, each player Angel of Destiny attacked this turn loses the game.

property.value: "Archons dispense justice according to an ancient, and flawed, premise." - Nissa Revane

At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have a full party, target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life for the first time each turn, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token. {2}{W}: Another target Cleric gains lifelink until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My cats have taught me more about the sacred than anything in some old ruin."

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I swing a sword. It's a simple life. A lot of adventurers just see me as some cheap muscle, but if my steel lets them return home with their lives and limbs intact, then I've done my job."

property.name: Rules

property.value: "From legend it was forged, and to legend it returns."

property.value: "The gifts of the past must find their way into deserving hands."
